answerText: Shame[10] This other novel by the author of Shame opens with the explosion of a plane over the English Channel. In it, Gibreel Farishta takes on the role of the archangel Gabriel and Saladin Chamcha becomes the Devil.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | NYU A + MSU + Caltech A | 6 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Bunny Shakil, Chunni, and Munnee all pretend to give birth to Omar Khayyam Shakil at the same time. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this novel set in the town of Q that focuses on the lives of General Muhammad Zia-ul-Haq and Zulfikar Ali Bhutto.
